original_text: Then the man went to the Jewish leaders. He told them that it was Jesus who had made him well.
korean_text: 그 사람이 유대인들에게 가서 자기를 고친 이는 예수라 하니라

sentences.original_text: Then the man went to the Jewish leaders.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그 사람은 유대 지도자들에게 갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: that it was Jesus who had made him well.
sentences.korean_translation: 자신을 낫게 하신 분이 예수님이라고 말했습니다.
